title: Episode 385 - DB Sports Companion Show 02/19/19 - Oakland Raiders Fullback Keith Smith
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Oakland Raiders starting fullback Keith Smith to discuss what life is really like in the NFL, how hard it is to stay in the league, and what Jon Gruden is really like.
